translation.en: One, two, three!
♪ Take off ♪ ♪ Last stop ♪
♪ Countdown till we blast open the top ♪
translation.it: Conto alla rovescia Finché non sfondiamo

translation.en: ♪ Face first ♪ ♪ Full charge ♪
translation.it: Prima la faccia Carica a mille

translation.en: ♪ Electric hammer to the heart ♪
♪ Clocks move faster ♪
♪ 'Cause it's all we're after now ♪
translation.it: Perché è tutto ciò che vogliamo

translation.en: ♪ Won't stop climbing ♪
♪ 'Cause this is our time, yeah ♪
translation.it: Perché è il nostro momento, sì

translation.en: ♪ When all the days felt black and white ♪
translation.it: Le giornate in bianco e nero

translation.en: ♪ Those were the best shades of my life ♪
translation.it: Erano le più belle della mia vita

translation.en: ♪ Don't look down ♪
♪ 'Cause we're still rising ♪
♪ Up right now ♪
♪ And even if we hit the ground ♪
♪ We'll still fly ♪
♪ Keep dreaming like we'll live forever ♪
translation.it: Sogna come se la vita fosse eterna

translation.en: ♪ But live it like it's now or never ♪
translation.it: Ma vivila come se non ci fosse un domani

translation.en: ♪ We ain't searching for tomorrow ♪
♪ Tomorrow ♪
♪ 'Cause we got all we need today ♪
translation.it: Perché abbiamo tutto ciò che ci serve oggi

translation.en: ♪ Today ♪
♪ Living on a feeling ♪
♪ That's been running through our veins ♪
♪ We're the revolution ♪
♪ That's been singing in the rain ♪
♪ Don't look down ♪
♪ 'Cause we're still rising up right now ♪
translation.it: Perché stiamo ancora salendo Su, proprio adesso

translation.en: ♪ And even if we hit the ground ♪
♪ We'll still fly ♪
♪ Keep dreaming like we'll live forever ♪
translation.it: Sogna come se la vita fosse eterna

translation.en: ♪ But live it like it's now or never ♪
translation.it: Ma vivila come se non ci fosse un domani

translation.en: ♪ It's now or never ♪
translation.it: Come se non ci fosse un domani

translation.en: ♪ Now or never ♪
-[girl 1] Whoo! Excellent! -[guy] Sounds great, guys!
-Yeah! -[band members laugh]
Thank you! We're Sunset Curve!
Too bad we wasted the tightest we've played on sound check!
translation.it: Peccato fosse solo il sound check. Mai suonato meglio.

translation.en: Wait until tonight, man, when this place gets packed with record execs.
translation.it: Vedrai stasera, quando sarà pieno di discografici.

translation.en: Alex, you were smoking.
Oh no. I was just warming up. You guys were the ones on fire.
translation.it: Mi stavo solo scaldando. Voi eravate a mille, invece.

translation.en: Could you just own your awesomeness for once?
translation.it: Per una volta, prendi e porta a casa.

translation.en: -All right, I was killing it. -[chuckles]
OK, well, I'm thinking we fuel up before the show. I'm thinking street dogs.
translation.it: Dobbiamo ricaricarci prima del concerto. Hot dog al volo?

translation.en: -Ooh! -Yes.
Hey, Bobby, where you going?
I'm good.
Vegetarian. I could never hurt an animal.
You guys are really good.
Thank you.
I see a lot of bands.
Been in a couple myself. I was really feeling it.
translation.it: Suono anch'io. Mi avete trasmesso tutto.

translation.en: That's what we do this for. I'm Luke, by the way.
translation.it: Suoniamo per questo. Piacere, sono Luke.

translation.en: -Hi, I'm Reggie. -Alex.
Nice meeting you guys.
I'm Rose.
here's our demo.
And a T-shirt. Size beautiful.
Thanks.
I'll make sure not to wipe the tables down with this one.
translation.it: - Cercherò di non pulirci i tavoli. - Buona idea.

translation.en: Oh, good call. Whenever they get wet, they just kinda fall apart in your hands.
translation.it: - Cercherò di non pulirci i tavoli. - Buona idea. Quando si bagnano, ti si disintegrano in mano.

translation.en: Don't you guys have to go get hot dogs?
translation.it: Non stavate andando a prendere degli hot dog?

translation.en: Yeah, he had a hamburger for lunch.
translation.it: Sì. A pranzo, lui ha mangiato un hamburger.

translation.en: -That's what I'm talking about! -[Reggie chuckles]
The smell of Sunset Boulevard?
No. [chuckles]
It's what that girl said in there tonight.
translation.it: Di quello che ha detto quella ragazza.

translation.en: About our music, all right? It's like an energy.
translation.it: Della nostra musica, no? Emana energia.

translation.en: It connects us with people.
They can feel us when we play.
I want that connection with everybody.
Then we're gonna need more T-shirts.
Let's go, boys.
Ladies.
Reggie, wait! [girl 1 squeals]
-[girl 2] Oh my God. Reggie! -[girl 1] Oh my God! Hi, it's me!
translation.it: - Oddio, Reggie! - Reggie! Ciao, sono io!

translation.en: Man... I can't wait until we eat someplace
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di mangiare in un posto

translation.en: where the condiments aren't served out of the back of an Oldsmobile.
translation.it: dove non servano i condimenti nel baule di una Oldsmobile.

translation.en: Hey... Sorry, I got some pickle juice on your battery cables.
translation.it: Ehi, scusa, mi è caduto un po' di aceto sui cavi della batteria.

translation.en: No problem. It'll help with the rust.
-That can't... -[man chuckles]
OK. What?
This is awesome, you guys.
We're playing The Orpheum!
I can't even count how many bands have played here and then ended up being huge.
translation.it: Qui hanno suonato un sacco di band che poi hanno avuto un successo enorme.

translation.en: We're gonna be legends!
Eat up, boys.
'Cause after tonight, everything changes.
That's a new flavor.
Chill, man. Street dogs haven't killed us yet.
translation.it: Tranquillo, un hot dog non ha mai ucciso nessuno.

translation.en: Hey, underachiever.
Hey, disappointment.
OK, I know you don't want me to ask, but have you figured out
translation.it: So che non ti va che te lo chieda, ma sai già cosa farai?

translation.en: -what you're gonna do today? -I'll know in the moment.
translation.it: So che non ti va che te lo chieda, ma sai già cosa farai? Deciderò sul momento.

translation.en: Really, Jules?
That's all you're giving me?
Mrs. Harrison said this is your last chance.
translation.it: Per la prof.ssa Harrison, è la tua ultima chance.

translation.en: I know. I was there.
translation.it: Lo so, c'ero quando l'ha detto.

translation.en: -[sighs] -[girl] See you at the rally!
Ugh! What is she handing out?
-Hi! -Desperation?
Here you go. My group's performing at the spirit rally tomorrow.
translation.it: Prego. Il mio gruppo si esibisce alla festa pre-partita.

translation.en: I'm sure you guys have nothing better to do.
translation.it: Sono sicura che non avete di meglio da fare.

translation.en: [sarcastically] Oh my gosh, Carrie. Thanks!
Oh my gosh, Flynn. Don't bother coming!
translation.it: Oddio, Flynn, non disturbarti a venire!

translation.en: Here you go.
[Carrie] Come see Dirty Candy tomorrow. Nick?
translation.it: - Venite a vedere le Dirty Candy, domani. - Nick?

translation.en: [Flynn] Still?
You know they're gonna get married and have a bunch of unholy babies.
translation.it: Sai che si sposeranno e faranno un sacco di pesti.

translation.en: Nick's a sweetheart.
You'd actually have to talk to him to know that.
And only one of them has to be a demon to make a demon baby.
translation.it: E basta che uno dei due sia un demone per fare figli demoni.

translation.en: Demon!
There's that smile. Now, let's go prove everybody wrong.
translation.it: Ecco il tuo sorriso. Ora dimostriamo a tutti che si sbagliano.

translation.en: Nice job, Nick.
Almost as impressive as your game against Glendale.
translation.it: Quasi quanto alla partita contro la Glendale.

translation.en: OK, we have one last performance. [claps] Julie?
Take your time.
I'm sorry.
Is this when we clap?
Watch it, Carrie.
Oh good. You're home.
I was about to go watch your brother's game.
translation.it: Vado alla partita di tuo fratello.

translation.en: I've had photo shoots all day. Didn't even get a chance to eat.
translation.it: Ho fatto foto tutto il giorno, non ho neanche mangiato.

translation.en: But... I got a phone call today.
translation.it: Ma... Oggi ho ricevuto una telefonata.

translation.en: Yeah, I figured as much.
Yeah.
-Well, it was my Realtor friend. -Oh, that.
translation.it: - Era la mia amica, l'agente immobiliare. - Oh, lei.

translation.en: Yeah, and she says if we are serious about selling the house,
translation.it: Dice che se vogliamo davvero vendere la casa,

translation.en: then she wants me to take some pictures for the website.
translation.it: devo fare delle foto per il sito.

translation.en: Which means we have to do a lot of cleaning
and get rid of some stuff.
And maybe you can... tackle Mom's studio?
translation.it: E magari potresti occuparti dello studio della mamma?

translation.en: You're the expert.
You know, your brother and I wouldn't even know where to begin.
translation.it: Io e tuo fratello non sapremmo da dove iniziare.

translation.en: It's OK, honey. If you're not ready, I--
No. It's all right.
Maybe I'll try tonight.
Yeah? [claps]
Awesome, mija. Thank you. Oh, and don't forget the loft.
translation.it: Fantastico, mija. Grazie. Non dimenticare la soffitta.

translation.en: You know, those old instruments that were there when we moved in?
translation.it: Ricordi i vecchi strumenti che abbiamo trovato qui?

translation.en: They need a new home.
Mom would like that.
[dad] Yeah, she would.
Oh God. I'm gonna be late.
Under the mail.
[snaps fingers] You're a lifesaver.
I'm so sorry, Mom.
That I haven't been here.
translation.it: Di non essere mai venuta qui.

translation.en: How did we get back here?
-Dad! -[dad] Whoa! Hey!
Whoa! Slow down. You look like you've seen a ghost.
translation.it: Calma. Sembra che tu abbia visto un fantasma.

translation.en: -I have! -Cool.
Not cool! [grunts]
Run! [grunts]
[sighs] Come on, Flynn. 911 means 911!
Why aren't you answering me? [exhales sharply]
-[Julie] Dad. -Sorry.
Just wanted to make sure you were OK.
You don't believe me, do you?
translation.it: - Non mi credi, vero? - Certo che ti credo.

translation.en: Honey, of course I do. Mija, I see your mom all the time.
translation.it: - Non mi credi, vero? - Certo che ti credo. Mija, vedo sempre tua madre.

translation.en: This isn't like that.
I know. It's different for all of us.
translation.it: Lo so. Per ognuno è diverso.

translation.en: Dad, you're not listening to me.
I saw something out there.
All right. OK. OK.
I'm listening.
Tell me what you saw. It's just you and me here.
translation.it: Dimmi cos'hai visto. Siamo da soli, qui.

translation.en: [sighs] You sound just like Dr. Turner.
Well, maybe seeing Dr. Turner again isn't such a bad idea.
translation.it: Beh, magari ti farebbe bene tornare dal dott. Turner.

translation.en: Dad!
Can we just drop it?
All right.
Dropped.
[dad] We good?
Yeah.
Are you still here...
[exhales shakily] ...whatever you are?
I know I saw something. I'm not crazy.
translation.it: So di aver visto qualcosa. Non sono pazza.

translation.en: Well, we're all a little crazy.
Oh my God! Please stop screaming!
Who are you, and what are you doing in my mom's studio?
translation.it: Chi siete? Che fate nello studio di mamma?

translation.en: Your mom's studio? This is our studio. Trust me, my...
translation.it: Lo studio di tua madre? Questo è il nostro studio. Credimi. Il pianoforte a coda è nuovo e...

translation.en: The grand piano is new, and... and... and ...
translation.it: Credimi. Il pianoforte a coda è nuovo e...

translation.en: [giggling] My couch!
That is definitely not my six-string.
translation.it: Però quella non è la mia chitarra.

translation.en: Can you give me just one second?
Just... give me a second. Thank you.
Guys, what is going on? How did she get her stuff in here so fast?
translation.it: Ragazzi, come ha fatto a mettere le sue cose qui così in fretta?

translation.en: Maybe... maybe she's a witch. There's chairs floating on the ceiling.
translation.it: Forse è una strega. Ci sono sedie che fluttuano sul soffitto.

translation.en: OK, there is no such thing as witches.
You sure? I used to think there was no such thing as ghosts.
translation.it: Sicuro? Pensavo lo stesso dei fantasmi.

translation.en: That's fair. OK, so we're going with witch?
translation.it: - Hai ragione. - Ok, quindi è una strega?

translation.en: No! We are not going with witch. She's not a witch. OK, look. She's just scared.
translation.it: No! Macché strega! Non è una strega. È solo spaventata.

translation.en: OK? Let someone with a softer touch handle this.
translation.it: Lasciate fare a chi è più gentile di voi.

translation.en: Why are you in our studio?
translation.it: Che ci fai nel nostro studio?

translation.en: Oh my gosh! How did you do that?
Clearly, you're not understanding... She doesn't get it. OK, look. We're ghosts, all right?
translation.it: È chiaro che non capisci. Non ha capito. Senti, noi siamo fantasmi.

translation.en: We're just three ghosts, and we're really happy to be home.
translation.it: Tre fantasmi felici di essere a casa.

translation.en: So, thank you for the flowers. They really brighten up the room.
translation.it: Quindi, grazie per i fiori. Illuminano l'ambiente.

translation.en: -We're in a band called Sunset Curve. -Tell your friends.
translation.it: - Siamo i Sunset Curve. - Dillo agli amici.

translation.en: Last night was supposed to be a really big night for us. It was gonna change our lives.
translation.it: La serata di ieri sera avrebbe dovuto cambiarci la vita.

translation.en: I'm, uh... I'm pretty sure it did.
This is freaking me out. [breathes sharply, grunts]
-What is that? What are you doing? -It's my phone.
translation.it: - Cos'è? Che fai? - È il mio cellulare.

translation.en: No! Stop talking to them. They aren't real.
translation.it: No, smettila di parlarci, non sono reali.

translation.en: -There's no such thing as cute ghosts. -Oh, think we're cute?
translation.it: - I fantasmi carini non esistono. - Oh, ci trovi carini?

translation.en: -[Julie taps keys] -Who you calling? I'm Googling Sunset Swerve.
translation.it: - Chi chiami? - Sono cercando Sunset Swerve.

translation.en: [all] Sunset Curve!
[Julie] Whoa.
There is a Sunset Curve.
You did die.
But not last night.
Twenty-five years ago?
What? No. No, no, no. Th-Th-That's impossible.
After we floated out of the ambulance, all we did was go to that weird, dark room where Alex cried.
translation.it: Dopo l'ambulanza, siamo finiti in una stanza buia, dove Alex ha pianto.

translation.en: [high-pitched] Well... I don't think...
I think we were all pretty upset. OK.
But that was just for like an hour.
We just showed up here. Look. I'm just telling you what my phone says.
translation.it: - Poi siamo arrivati qui. - Guardate. Qui c'è scritto così.

translation.en: See? You died in 1995.
When you were 17.
It's now 2020.
So, this is the future?
Wait. So... So, it has been 25 years.
I have been crying for 25 years? How is that possible?
translation.it: Ho pianto per 25 anni? - Com'è possibile? - Beh, sei emotivo.

translation.en: -Well, you're a very emotional person. -I am not!
translation.it: - Com'è possibile? - Beh, sei emotivo. Non è vero!

translation.en: [boy] Thought you were afraid to come out here.
translation.it: Non avevi paura di venire qui?

translation.en: You talking to your ghost friend? How does he look? Is he hideous?
translation.it: Parli col tuo amico fantasma? Che aspetto ha? È orribile?

translation.en: -He can see you. -No, he can't.
What?
Uh... What do you want?
A normal sister, for starters. Stop being weird and come eat.
translation.it: Una sorella normale, per esempio. Basta stranezze e vieni a mangiare.

translation.en: He couldn't see you.
Yeah. I mean, that's... -usually how ghosts work. -[Reggie] Hmm.
translation.it: Sì. Cioè, di solito funziona così coi fantasmi.

translation.en: Look, I'm very sorry for what happened to you guys, but this isn't your studio anymore.
translation.it: Mi spiace per ciò che vi è successo, ma questo non è più il vostro studio.

translation.en: You have to leave.
But wait. We...
-We didn't get your name. -It's Julie.
translation.it: - Non ci hai detto il tuo nome. - Julie.

translation.en: Cool. [chuckles] I-I'm Luke,
by... by the way.
-And this is-- -Reggie. I'm Reggie.
translation.it: - E lui è... - Reggie. Sono Reggie.

translation.en: -Hey. -[Luke] And...
Alex. How's it going?
OK?
Julie seems nice.
Did you miss the part where she kicked us out, or...
translation.it: Non hai sentito che ci ha cacciati?

translation.en: Yes. OK.
There we go!
OK.
-Let's do this. -Let's do it.
Your turn, Carlos.
Thank you for our leftovers and the power of the mighty microwave.
translation.it: Grazie per gli avanzi e per l'aiuto del potente microonde.

translation.en: -Amen. -Amen.
So...
Carlos tells me he found you in the studio.
translation.it: Carlos mi ha detto che ti ha trovata nello studio.

translation.en: She was out there talking to herself.
I was rehearsing for a play.
[woman] Hello, hello!
Oh, busted!
Yeah, we're in here. Quick!
Spaghetti. Again?
Yeah.
That's too bad.
I brought you my pasteles and arroz con pollo.
translation.it: Vi ho portato i miei pasteles e arroz con pollo.

translation.en: -Yum. -[Julie] Mm!
Thanks, tia. It smells great.
translation.it: Grazie, tía. Hanno un ottimo profumo.

translation.en: You can have it tomorrow.
I can't let you have leftovers every night.
translation.it: Non posso lasciarvi mangiare avanzi ogni sera.

translation.en: My sister would kill me, may she rest in peace.
translation.it: Mia sorella mi ucciderebbe, che riposi in pace.

translation.en: Oh... I see things here are going better?
translation.it: Vedo che le cose vanno meglio.

translation.en: Actually...
...Julie has been cleaning out mom's studio.
translation.it: Julie ha ripulito lo studio della mamma.

translation.en: Hopefully, we can get the house on the market and some offers soon.
translation.it: Speriamo di mettere in vendita la casa e di ricevere offerte.

translation.en: Well, I like the sound of that.
Moving from here is only gonna help you move on.
translation.it: Trasferirvi vi aiuterà ad andare avanti.

translation.en: You've got to rip that Band-Aid off and get the pain over with.
translation.it: Dovete strappare quel cerotto e superare il dolore.

translation.en: [chuckles awkwardly] That's me. Ripping off the Band-Aid.
translation.it: Sono io quando mi strappo il cerotto.

translation.en: There's my brave girl.
Hey, Julie, I really like what you guys did with the place.
translation.it: Julie, mi piace come avete sistemato qui.

translation.en: -You shouldn't be here. -[aunt gasps]
Oh, I'm just here to help, mija.
translation.it: Oh, sono qui solo per aiutare, mija.

translation.en: Oh... I think that's our cue to leave.
I mean, you should be at Pilates.
-Thanks for bringing us food. -Oh. [chuckles]
-We should've called first. -[aunt] It's nothing.
And now that you're no longer in the music program,
translation.it: E ora che non segui più il corso di musica,

translation.en: you can concentrate on classes that matter.
You got the e-mail from the school, right?
translation.it: Hai letto la mail della scuola?

translation.en: Yeah.
We're still discussing it.
Bueno. I'm off to Pilates.
-Mwah! -Oh yeah!
Wa-chow! It's gone.
So, Julie,
wanna hear how I slid into home and was almost safe?
translation.it: che sono arrivato in scivolata a casa base e mi sono quasi salvato?

translation.en: You're a good brother. That's not gonna work.
I tried.
Why didn't you tell me? You made me lie to your aunt.
translation.it: Perché non me l'hai detto? Ho dovuto mentire a tua zia.

translation.en: Sorry. I was gonna tell you after dinner.
translation.it: Scusa. Te l'avrei detto dopo cena.

translation.en: -Yeah. Mm-hmm. -I was.
Honey, I know those classes can be difficult,
translation.it: Tesoro, so che quel corso è difficile,

translation.en: but you still like music, don't you?
translation.it: ma ti piace la musica, no?

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe.
Look, we talked about this, you know? And how painful memories can be, but...
translation.it: Ne abbiamo parlato. Sai che i ricordi possono essere dolorosi.

translation.en: You know, every time I see you and Carlos, I see Mom.
translation.it: Quando guardo te e Carlos, vedo la mamma.

translation.en: It's like she's right here with us.
translation.it: È come se fosse qui con noi.

translation.en: But you know what? I love that. I do.
translation.it: Ma sai una cosa? Mi piace, davvero.

translation.en: And maybe if you'd give yourself a chance,
translation.it: E forse, se ti dai una possibilità,

translation.en: you'll get there.
What's that?
I must have left the stereo on in the garage. I'll go get it.
translation.it: Avrò lasciato lo stereo acceso in garage. Vado a vedere.

translation.en: [yells] Guys! Guys, stop!
Enough! Stop! Cut it out!
The whole neighborhood could hear you. I thought I told you to leave.
translation.it: Vi sente tutto il quartiere. Vi avevo detto di andarvene.

translation.en: Wait. People can hear us play?
Yes! And so did my dad and my brother!
translation.it: Sì! E anche mio padre e mio fratello!

translation.en: W-W-Wait. Wait. So, only you can see us,
translation.it: Aspetta. Quindi solo tu puoi vederci,

translation.en: but everyone can hear us?
-I mean, what kind of ghosts are we? -Who cares, man? People can hear us play!
translation.it: - Che razza di fantasmi siamo? - Che importa! La gente ci sente suonare!

translation.en: We might be dead, but our music isn't.
translation.it: La nostra musica è ancora viva!

translation.en: Dad!
Hey.
Just making sure you're OK. Yeah, I'm fine. I just had to turn off the CD player.
translation.it: - Volevo sapere se stavi bene. - Sì. Ho dovuto spegnere il lettore CD.

translation.en: Wait. Is this the junk that was in the loft?
Junk?
Some of this stuff's in pretty good shape.
Hey, maybe we can make a couple bucks.
What? Yo, stop touching my drums. Tell him to stop touching my drums.
translation.it: Cosa? Smettila di toccare la mia batteria. Digli di smetterla.

translation.en: I liked that song you had on.
-Sweet! We're Sunset Curve. -Tell your friends.
translation.it: - Forte! Siamo i Sunset Curve. - Dillo agli amici.

translation.en: It's just an old CD I found.
translation.it: È un vecchio CD che ho trovato.

translation.en: Well, still, it's nice that you're listening to music again.
translation.it: Beh, è bello che ascolti di nuovo musica.

translation.en: Out here you can play whatever you want, whenever you want.
translation.it: Qui puoi suonare quello che vuoi, quando vuoi.

translation.en: That's nice!
Stay out of this.
I-I'm sorry, honey. I didn't...
Oh no, no, no, no. Not you. I mean... Uh... Er...
You know, give me a minute.
Hey. Hey. Hey. Hey.
We'll figure out this music program thing. Thanks, Dad.
translation.it: - Riparleremo del corso di musica. - Grazie, papà.

translation.en: -He likes our song. -Oh yeah. He doesn't count.
translation.it: - Gli piace la nostra canzone. - Sì, ma non conta.

translation.en: He's a dad.
Why can't you guys just be normal ghosts?
translation.it: Perché non siete dei fantasmi normali?

translation.en: Hang out at an old mansion. I hear Pasadena's nice.
translation.it: Infestate una vecchia villa. Dicono che Pasadena sia bella.

translation.en: I think she's warming up to us.
translation.it: Credo che si stia abituando a noi.

translation.en: Yeah, I've always wanted to go to Pasadena.
Stop that. I'm serious.
translation.it: Non farlo più, dico sul serio.

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry.
What do you want?
I know this is all completely insane, but you do know how rad this is?
translation.it: So che è assurdo, ma sai anche tu che è bestiale.

translation.en: People... Actual people can hear us play.
translation.it: Le persone riescono a sentirci suonare.

translation.en: Yeah, it's just I've just had a really, really awful day.
translation.it: Sì, è solo che ho avuto una giornata davvero orribile.

translation.en: -I gotta go. -Well, I'm sorry you had a bad day,
translation.it: - Devo andare. - Mi dispiace per te,

translation.en: but three guys just found out that they had a bad 25 years,
translation.it: ma 3 ragazzi hanno scoperto di aver avuto 25 anni orribili,

translation.en: and then they found out that the one thing they lived for
translation.it: ma anche che possono ancora fare

translation.en: in the first place they can still do.
That's pretty rad.
You're right.
-It's just... -Your bad day.
Yeah. I know.
Look, I'm sorry we came into your life,
translation.it: Scusa se siamo piombati nella tua vita,

translation.en: but...
what I just felt in there actually made me feel alive again.
translation.it: ciò che ho provato lì dentro mi fa sentire di nuovo vivo.

translation.en: We all felt alive again.
translation.it: Ci siamo sentiti di nuovo vivi.

translation.en: So, you can kick us out if you want, but we're not giving up music.
translation.it: Se vuoi, puoi cacciarci, ma non rinunceremo alla musica.

translation.en: We can play again. That's a gift no musician would ever turn down.
translation.it: Possiamo suonare di nuovo! È un dono, nessun musicista rifiuterebbe.

translation.en: You gotta know that. Clearly, your mom is into music.
translation.it: Dovresti saperlo. È chiaro che tua madre ama la musica.

translation.en: Was.
She passed away.
I am... so sorry.
[Alex] Yeah, we... we didn't know.
It's all right.
You guys haven't seen her anywhere, have you?
translation.it: Non l'avete vista in giro, vero?

translation.en: From wherever you're from.
No. No, I mean, you're kind of the first person we've seen.
translation.it: No. No, sei la prima persona che vediamo.

translation.en: Yeah, but she's not dead, so it doesn't answer her question.
translation.it: Ma lei non è morta, quindi non vale.

translation.en: Yeah. I think she knows what we mean.
I'm sorry for your loss.
Thanks.
Sorry I got mad.
You guys are kinda good.
Kinda?
Y-Y-You know that's like 25 years of rust just getting dusted off.
translation.it: Sai che dobbiamo toglierci 25 anni di ruggine.

translation.en: -Yeah. Do you play the piano too? -[Julie] No.
No, I don't play. That was my mom's stuff in there.
translation.it: No, non suono. Era tutta roba di mia madre.

translation.en: No way. She's an amazing songwriter.
She was.
Wait. How would you know?
There's a song on the piano. If it's hers...
translation.it: C'è una canzone al piano. Se è sua...

translation.en: Your mom was really talented.
I guess... if you need a place to stay,
translation.it: Beh... Se vi serve un posto dove stare,

translation.en: you can stay in there.
There's a bathroom in the back
and a couch that turns into a bed if you still use any of that stuff.
translation.it: e un divano letto, se usate ancora queste cose.

translation.en: Dibs on the shower!
I just really like showers and sometimes the occasional bath.
translation.it: Mi piacciono le docce e anche fare il bagno, a volte.

translation.en: This...
This is just too weird.
Yeah.
[Julie] "What would you say if I told you
there are three ghosts living in my mom's studio?"
translation.it: che ci sono tre fantasmi nello studio di mia madre?"

translation.en: You'd say I'm crazy.
Hey, I know being dead isn't our first choice,
translation.it: So che essere morti non è il massimo,

translation.en: but, I mean, it sure is easy getting around.
Easy for you, maybe.
I lost my shirt on that one.
Ooh, never mind! There it is.
OK, so, why'd you bring us here?
translation.it: Ok, perché ci hai portati qui?

translation.en: Just another painful reminder of where we never got to play.
translation.it: È solo un doloroso ricordo di dove non abbiamo mai suonato.

translation.en: -Thanks, Luke. -I mean, boys, the game isn't over yet.
translation.it: - Grazie, Luke. - La partita non è ancora finita.

translation.en: I'm telling you, we've been given a second chance.
translation.it: Vi dico che ci è stata data una seconda occasione.

translation.en: Let's find some music.
Let's see how many clubs we can hit before sunrise.
translation.it: Vediamo in quanti locali entriamo prima dell'alba.

translation.en: Hey!
[Luke] Hey, Alex. You coming?
Let's go!
Guys?
Guys?
♪ Here's one thing ♪
♪ I want you to know ♪
♪ You got someplace to go ♪
♪ Life's a test, yes But you go toe-to-toe ♪
translation.it: La vita è un test, sì Ma tu la prendi di petto

translation.en: ♪ You don't give up, no You grow ♪
translation.it: Non ti arrendi, no Tu cresci

translation.en: ♪ And you use your pain ♪
♪ 'Cause it makes you you ♪
translation.it: Perché ti rende ciò che sei

translation.en: ♪ Though I wish I could hold you through it ♪
♪ I know it's not the same ♪
translation.it: So che non è lo stesso

translation.en: ♪ You got living to do ♪
♪ And I just want you to do it ♪
translation.it: E io voglio che tu la viva

translation.en: ♪ So get up, get out Relight that spark ♪
translation.it: Quindi alzati, esci Riaccendi quella scintilla

translation.en: ♪ You know the rest by heart ♪
translation.it: Il resto, lo sai a memoria

translation.en: ♪ Wake up, wake up If it's all you do ♪
translation.it: Svegliati, svegliati Anche se è tutto ciò che fai

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.it: Guarda fuori Guarda dentro di te

translation.en: ♪ It's not what you lost ♪
translation.it: Non è ciò che hai perso

translation.en: ♪ It's what you'll gain Raising your voice to the rain ♪
translation.it: È ciò che guadagnerai Urlando alla pioggia

translation.en: ♪ Wake up your dream and make it true ♪
translation.it: Risveglia il tuo sogno E fallo avverare

translation.en: [Julie continues singing] ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.it: Guarda fuori Guarda dentro di te

translation.en: ♪ Relight that spark Time to come out of the dark ♪
translation.it: Riaccendi quella scintilla È ora di uscire dal buio

♪ No reason not to try ♪
